paper_abstract: The hierarchical hypercube network, which was proposed as an alternative to the hypercube. is suitable for building a large-scale multiprocessor system. A bipartite graph G = (V, E) is bipancyclic if it contains cycles of all even lengths ranging from 4 to |V|. In this paper, we show that the hierarchical hypercube network is bipancyclic. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Finding cycles in hierarchical hypercube networks
